Text.Page:
Welcome back, . I hope you're ready for your fifth archery task. You're nearly finished.

Things will be a little bit different this time: You need to clear a total of three dungeons suitable for your level, or, as before, clear the same dungeon three times. Any combination totaling three, really.

And at your level, these dungeons will be harder than anything you've faced before."I'm ready for anything."
Well done! At the rate you're going, I'll be taking lessons from you soon!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I'm feeling very confident."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
